text: Mizhiyorangalil is an unreleased Indian Malayalam-language film produced in 1987, directed by S. Mohan and written by Puthiyankam Murali, starring Mohanlal (guest appearance), Rahman, and Rohini. ==Cast== * Mohanlal in guest appearance * Rohini * Rahman * Nedumudi Venu * Thilakan * Vijayaraghavan * Jagathy Sreekumar * Innocennt * Ajaykrishnan ==Soundtrack== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films Category:Unreleased Malayalam-language films
title: Mizhiyorangalil
